::Zardus::

Every single one of the shots hits its target (walls can't really 
dodge :-). When the smoke clears, the wall is still there, but very 
badly damaged and close to giving in. The autoguns target Unitron's 
head and the heads of the two bots that he was now attached to. The 
gas filled the room, beginning to seep into any opening it could find 
and attacking the circuitry.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus calmly watched the damage report come up on the screen. He 
smiles slightly to himself and taps a few buttons. Gas pipes explode 
in the rooms around the room that Unitron was in, flooding those 
rooms with the same neuro-circuitry-destroying gas. The base damage 
ddin't really matter. With the blast doors in place, and considering 
the size of the base, Zardus didn't see how Unitron could get out on 
time. Of course, not seeing didn't mean there wasn't a way.

Zardus taps several more keys, half of the blast doors in the area 
lifting and gass filling the corridors inbetween the blast doors.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:
> 
> 
> 
> Unitron received orders, and was intent on filling them out, 
especially after 
> this.  "Zardus is a traitor.  If we do not survive this, we will be 
reborn.  
> I may do something strange my allies, but only focus on freeing 
ourselves."
> 
> Unitron and the rest got to a far corner of the room, two tendrils 
extending 
> from his forehead, boring into the back of Sixshot and Ares' heads.
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter transformed to tank mode, letting loose three sonic 
shells at a 
> corner of the room.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sixshot took out a missile launcher, firing a missile at the same 
corner.
> 
> ---
> 
> Ares fired off three laser bolts from his rifle at the same corner.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch raised a pincher, firing two missiles at the same 
corner.  
> Raising his tail, he fired off a burst of acid at the same spot.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror raised his left arm, firing off three ion disks at the 
same corner.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector raised a missile launcher, firing two stinger missiles at 
the corner.
> 
> ---
> 
> Bumblebee coughed, being the weakest, and was losing concentration.
> 
> ---
